headline.main: AXIS DESERT LOSS MARKED BY IRONIES; Nazi Soldier's Pass for Leave in Alexandria Found Amid Battle Wreckage

lead_paragraph: WITH THE BRITISH EIGHTH ARMY, in Egypt, Nov. 1 (Delayed) -- Throughout the last twenty-four hours on all sectors there has been something of a lull, but one that will almost certainly be of short duration. In one part of the front those troops of the British Empire that thus far have borne the brunt of the heaviest fighting were relieved by others who were fresher.
abstract: Poles escape from Ger to Brit lines
